TITLE.P: Outreach Housing Support Service — For clients who are homeless or at the risk of being homeless

SHORT_DESCR.P: Provision of an outcomes focused housing support service, which will be delivered to people aged sixteen years and over who are homeless or at the risk of being homeless.

TITLE.P: Outreach Housing Support Service — Banff and Buchan

SHORT_DESCR.P: The service will deliver an outcomes focused Outreach Housing Support Service for clients who are homeless or at the risk of being homeless. Individuals referred to this service will come from a range of backgrounds with varying levels of complexity depending on where they are in their life’s journey; and may also have a range of health needs e.g. mental health, learning disabilities, physical disability, substance misuse etc.

The purpose of the support is to enable clients to make the successful transition to independent living and tenancy sustainment provided from a range of accommodation, including, but not limited to,temporary, shared, private / secure tenancies and family homes.

The support provided will be tailored to meet the needs of each client, providing those with the necessary life skills to make the most out of their lives giving them a better quality of life and to support them meet their full potential.

The support will be flexible to meet the clients’ changing needs, with a key aim to enable clients’ to sustain and maintain their tenancies. Provision of a housing support service for clients’ needs and inputs will vary as they progress through their individual journeys.

Currently, approximately 149 hours per week of housing support is commissioned from the independent care and support sector in Aberdeenshire. The approximate hours are given as a guide only and is not a guarantee of hours / work. The contract will be a single supplier framework agreement and all call off orders will be spot purchased.

Main Settlements-Banff, Macduff, Whitehills, Portsoy, Sandend, Aberchirder, Fordyce, Cornhill, Gardenstown, NewByth, Cairnbulg, Rosehearty, Fraserburgh, Crudie, Lonmay, Tyrie, New Aberdour, Inverallochy and Sandhaven.
The settlements identified are given as a guide only. Clients may live out with towns and villages in rural Banff and Buchan.

INFO_ADD.P: The maximum hourly rate is 18,05 GBP The maximum social mileage rate per mile is 0,45 GBP.
Economic operators may be excluded from this competition if they are in any of the situations referred to in regulation 58 of the Public Contracts (Scotland) Regulations 2015.
Note this is not a social work service. This service is being commissioned by Aberdeenshire Council Housing — Homeless Service.
